system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Mace)} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapons Proficiency (Pick}), @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.GLkYAewdiuXqQDG8]{Heavy Melee Weapons Martial Arts}

Benefits

When wielding a light mace, flail, heavy mace, kama, light pick, or heavy pick, the character receives +1 damage die when Sundering an object, and when attacking a target with armor that defends against the damage given, the AP loss for armor is doubled.
system.summary: +1 Damage Die when sundering, double AP damage
